title: Malta Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Malta increased 1.70 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Malta averaged 0.18 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 12.50 percent in January of 2003 and a record low of -21.30 percent in April of 2020. In Malta, the Retail sales report provides an aggregated measure of sales of retail goods and services over a specific time period. In Malta, Retail sales are seasonal, volatile and relatively important to the overall economy. This page provides - Malta Retail Sales MoM - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
